content.detailedDescription: I was fishing in my boat then i saw a bright flame i thought it was a plane but when it got a bit closer i saw there was no plane i was scared but i quickly phoned the local police but after i phoned it looked like it hit the water.
content.summary: It looks like a missile sorry if my english bad

content.detailedDescription: Me and my uncle along with my aunt and cousins were attending the fire work display up the road from our home at the public park where the harbor is located. approximately ten minutes after the display began my uncle noticed a round flashing ball of light in the sky over the lake where we were the lake is lake huron . he noticed it was changing colors from red to blue then green at times it would be two of the colors at once flashing. my uncle then called my attention to it. when i first observed it i initially said it's a plane. as soon as i said it's a plane it started to move slowly across the sky at that point i then said oh uncle kenny it's probably a helicopter. at that point i observed it change colors from flashing solid red to flashing red green and then green blue then flash blue at the same time it went from a slow hover to rocketing straight up and abruptly changing direction to the east and then stop blinked out and when it re appeared it would be considerate distance from it's last location it started heading towards the north east direction and disappeared. there were no clouds and i stress the words no cloud cover it was clear night sky. we did not observe any other air traffic in the area nor heard any sound from it. we could see the star constatations with no visible obstacles.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Round ball of light flashed different colors along with fast movement and abrupt stop or change of direction

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside my west facing house, on a cloudless night at 10:32pm on 07/05/17 to let my dogs out to fertilize the front yard and i immediately look up to the southwest and see the exact same object i've seen 3 prior times in the exact same location of the sky, same altitude, flying the exact same compass heading (sw to ne), flying at the exact same slow speed (150 to 300mph)in the same hour of 10pm - 11pm and then just slowly disappear without a trace, in the exact same part of the sky after coming to a slow hover for a few seconds. each time the object appears to blindingly accelerate in dead silence at a 90 degree angle straight up until its no longer visible. the last time i saw the object was 07-04-17(last night around 10:10). i would guess each time that the object is roughly one mile from me at its closest approach as it slowly flies by on the exact same compass heading each time. object is bathed in a constant thick red glowing plasma that changes shape while the object is in motion. at one point i saw the plasma blow straight up around the edges of the object to reveal its shape and length which was flat or nearly flat on its bottom and maybe 100 feet from edge to edge. the plasma was too thick to see threw it though. object does not fly a laser straight path but instead slowly meanders in a somewhat straight line at changing slow speeds to its same predetermined hover spot before blindingly accelerating at 90 degrees. winds are always calm and visibility is nearly unlimited on 3 out of 4 sightings of this object. i knew i had time to run inside my house, based on where the object was in the sky at the time i saw it, and get my girlfriend out of the house for the last two sightings, so i did. that's all i know. lol
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4th time seeing exact same object, flying the exact same compass heading, in the exact same hour of the night, while in my front yard.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Well my siting occur during my incarceration  time in a ny state medium correctional facility  it was a sunday  drizzling morning for some reason i and a nother inmate my frien sanchez where alone during the encounter  i was the first to see it and inmediately knew what it was i couldn't believe it but i all ways knew it was real and i was looking right at it  i try to see if my friend knew what it was but he was a very ignorant  person and he told me that it was an helicopter but i know what we seen i look around for a guard but nobaty was around and that was very strange since this is a jail and the guard are allway on the corridors we entered the messhall and by the time we came out it was gone
content.summary: Happened earlie morning in a correctional facility on my way to breakfast

content.detailedDescription: I was in roswell on july 01 and taking pictures of the lightening storm. it was 10pm at night, and there was a clear view.  i saw an object moving just above the trees. it moved east to northeast. moved up and then northeast. no noise, but movement was not steady left to right, like an airplane. i have pictures. please review the pictures and let me know what you think.
content.summary: Ufo moving during thunder storm

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting on our deck at approx 10:20 pm. she pointed out a light moving near the horizon in the south west. as we observed the light move along a course towards the north east, it appeared to be a satellite. no airplane lights were observed, and it motion was very smooth, like a satellite. the light appeared to be above low lying clouds, but below higher clouds. after the light disappeared over the horizon to the north east, i performed an internet search to try to identify the object, but none could be found. the light traveled from my southwest horizon to the northeast in approx 2 minutes, and obtained a maximum altitude of about 70 degrees.
content.summary: A light in the sky that appeared to be a satellite (no satellite could be identified) moved across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
At around 3am i woke up and walked outside for a smoke. living north of cairns the night skies can be very clear. i was listening to the normal sounds of the night when it seemed to go really quiet. i didn't pay much attention to it but while looking up into the night skies i became aware of something moving off to my left in the sky. i turned my head to see 5 bright round objects in what i can only describe as a upside down tick formation. this formation was traveling from the north to the south very quickly. i became aware that right then it was dead quiet. not a sound. at first i wasn't sure what i was looking at. there was no reference for me to use. i observed this formation till it disappeared out of sight. it didn't deviate in direction or speed that was noticeable to me. i waited for a little while for the sounds of jet engines or some sound of propulsion but there was none. being ex military for many years, i'm well aware of what a jet fighter traveling at faster than sound leaves. there was no sound. no afterburners. the formation was far to close for that speed and at night, no navigation lights. the light of these "orb" like objects was visible from the front to the rear. no change in intensity. no rumble felt. just silent orb 
ike objects traveling very fast from north to south. there were no other lights in the skies other than the stars. shortly after it had disappeared the normal sounds of the night seemed to come back slowly. this is what i saw.......

                   o
                        o       from north to south rapidly
                   o
               o
           o
i had no reference point in which to judge the size of them with only the backdrop of the black skies. they weren't close to the ground, and my feeling was that they were well over 500ft above sea level.
content.summary: 5 round bright orb like lights. reverse tic formation.

content.detailedDescription: Yes it appeared as a glowing bright fireball up in the sky...Not very high thought it could be a chinese lantern maybe or a drone...But seemed to be bigger and no sound was made saw and tracked it for at least 5 minutes or more before i lost it. it appeared during fireworks in the area. so had to make sure it wasn't wasn't fireworks. but it hovered and moved slowly but constant
content.summary: Fireball moving thru the sky during fireworks

content.detailedDescription: Pointed my camera to south-east and found 3 objects. one seems like red light and when you zoom it, it does seem to be an inverted cross. that red light object was around the same position when i took photos before this current date, and portrayed a normal cross. it usually appears when objects are around. this is the first time i took photos of objects that seems to be rectangular.
content.summary: Pointed my camera to south-east and found 3 objects.

content.detailedDescription:
Filled out at mufon headquarter from a printed form of the case report, sent in the mail to headquarters. transferred information to online report by field investigator l. flechtner 18809 on july 5th, 2017. the report and letter is on file at headquarter and will be scanned in at a later date
------------------------------------------------------------------
i was walking at 10:30 at night toward the halifax river on may 20th, 2016. full mon which was about 11 o'clock high in the sky. could see mars & venus the size of small specks next to the moon. suddenly a round orangeish/yellow craft appeared over the middle of the river, heading south, about 2,500 ft. high. i was 2 blocks away. it was the size of an orange compared to mars & venus, made no sound at all, & had no flashing white, red or green lights like a normal aircraft. my father was a col. & a b-29 bomber pilot, the chief of maintenance at cannon afb, clovis, nm on f100's  f102's & f 105's, have flown on military commercial aircraft all around the world. after 3 or 4  seconds this orb went dark, the about 2 or 3 seconds later, very bright, white phosphorous-like flames came out from it in all directions, then it went dark again. i called 911, the night watchman at mayport naval air station, jax. fl. the s.B. police, volusia county sheriffs office  & the next morning the faa, d.B. airport, tower, ormond beach airport tower embry riddle aeronautical univ. tower, norad, and others. i immediately recognized this as a ufo!
content.summary: Round orangish/yellow orb appeared for 3 to 4 seconds then went totally dark-=no sound;no colored flashing lights. several seconds later bright white flames came out from it.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the 4th of july fireworks from the balcony of my condo when my girlfriend and i noticed a large red glowing orb that was high in the sky over the downtown loop area of chicago. this was nowhere near the fireworks that were over lake michigan to the east, this was by itself in the sky over the downtown area where all the skyscrapers are. fireworks are not allowed anywhere in that area which is why this glowing orb caught our attention immediately. it appeared high in the sky out of no where and hovered and then descended down behind the buildings. by the time i got my camera out, i only was able to catch the last 35 seconds, but i witnessed the orb for roughly 2 min total. my balcony is approximately 4-5 miles from downtown so when you zoom in on the video and look at its size of the orb relative to the buildings you can tell this is a pretty large object. i see planes fly over on a daily basis and this was not a plane either. based on its size, its glowing nature, and  its location and behavior in the sky, i just can't explain what it is that i saw. both of who saw it, were quite startled and knew this wasn't normal.
content.summary: Witnessed a large glowing red orb over downtown chicago that hovered then descended down behind building kings

content.detailedDescription:
About  20 guests were looking north towards fireworks in the distance  over the gibson island magothy river arnold md. once the fireworks display ended an  object appears in the sky  on our right coming from the east perhaps sse,  in a straight line pattern heading nnw and passed over our heads moving relatively fast. ( we were all on the south shore of the magothy river  we noticed it because it was a circle /orb/ball  and the color was yellow orange. fromn our perspective it could have been the larger than a golf ball and smaller than a basketball. this was not a plane

 the object seemingly escalated up into the sky and disappeared into the clouds.   the object was no where near where any fireworks were being shot off.  then about 5 minutes later two additional circles of the same size and color appeared in the same location and traveled the same path, same speed  from east sse to nnw. one behind the other.  they  also escalated up into the sky and disappeared into the clouds.
we are in a rural area with no city lights to effect the night sky and usually can see the stars quite clearly. we all thought we might have heard a slight noise but not sure.

the evening had heavy clouds as we had an earlier reain shower and was quite humid.

how we felt -- everyone  starting joking about what they were and what we saw --- no one knew .  thought it was quite weird.  we live on the water so we are always looking up into the night sky. often see planes  but this was not any plane. never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: While watching firework   objects appears from teh sse heading nnw that were bright orange and yellow.  they were no where near the fireworks but came from a differrent direction entirely.

content.detailedDescription:
Filed and filled out at mufon headquarters with witness on the phone by field investigator l. flechtner 18809, on july 5th, 2017.
-------------------------------------------------------------------


i was outside my house waiting and saw a soft red circle come up over the mt. lemmon/catalina mountains and then come down again. it was a soft red light, a perfect circle. it came up from behind the mountain and came down again. it was the size of a red traffic light. i guess it was 6,000 feet high and about 25 miles away from me.
i used to teach people how to use the big telescopes so i am familiar with lights in the sky. this light was nothing i have ever seen before.
the weather was clear with no wind.
i am retired and wear glasses to read.
content.summary: I was outside waiting and saw a soft red circle come up over the catalina mountains and then come down again.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my porch waiting for fireworks but was unable to see any when i spotted a circular object which was silver in color. pretty far up.. i then seen it turn a green color, then red and it was pulsating. once in a while it would disappear, figured it was over the clouds, which were minimal. it remained stationary so i went into the house to get my binoculars. i then checked the time..10:44 pm.I then see it release about 5 circular objects. they were clear except the out line was a gold color.  i did nt see where they went. i then began pulsating and changing colors.. my next door neighbor came out and asked about the fireworks and i told him i didnt see any but directed his attention to the object.. he asked what it was and i said i dont know. he suggested a drone, i then explain how it was stationary for about 30 to 40 minutes and how the colors were changing. he then seen the activity and was as dumbfounded as me. he then said it looked to be about 1300 feet (?) up .. dont know how accurate. while we were watching, the thing got brighter and turned blue and veered to the left pretty rapidly, i stood up then and said it must be done when the thing made a circle and came back past the area. it seemed to be descending as it made its way across the sky. i lost sight at it went toward the horizon.   the path it took i believe was east.
content.summary: Seen silver circular object, it then went to green, then red then pulsated for around an hour then went to blue and flew left circled then looked to be decending  then went into the vantage point

content.detailedDescription: Having 4th of july party, shooting fireworks then i noticed this bright star like object . it was passing fro north to the south.  like a star but it was moving. i watched it for about 5 to 10 minutes. then it disappears to the south towards ferndale i think.
content.summary: During fireworks show at s friends house i saw this bright light.

content.detailedDescription: I attended my local fireworks show last night, and began taking a few pictures with my mobile phone once the show started. i noticed nothing unusual until i got home and began uploading my photos to my tablet. upon observation, i noticed an unusual anomaly to the left of the fireworks display. it was a green, half-circle shape that appeared to be glowing. it was in all of the photos i took, but unfortunately i didn't take photos for the entire duration of the show. i also noticed once zoomed in that a second anomaly appears to be to the upper left of the very visible one. it was not in all of the photos, but just a few. someone suggested that it was a drone, but considering its size, i don't believe that's possible. especially when the second anomaly is also considered. judging by the photos in relativity to the parking lot lights, it was completely stationary. the second one possibly moved at some point, as it isn't visible in every photo i took.
content.summary: Took photos of fireworks show and saw it in the pictures after i uploaded them. did not see with naked eye.

content.detailedDescription:
Location: new brunswick, nj
approx time : july 4, 2017 9:30-9:45pm
sighting; 7 "lights" total.  first group of 3, then a group of 2 followed by another group of 2. all lights were moving in a south to north direction.
description of "light" : white-ish, constant luminosity with very minimal "flickering"
weather conditions: mostly clear with partial clouds. according to recorded weather: wind speed: 1 mph (nne) max wind speed: 8 mph visibility: 10 miles

while standing outside on corner of morell & wycoff streets  in new brunswick, a car coming down the street, pulled over & 2 young men jumped out, looking at the sky,  saying, "are you seeing that?" to one another.  there were fireworks going off (being the 4th) and i thought that was what they were seeing/talking about. then 1 young men pulled out his phone/camera & started recording. this made me curious, so i looked up and saw 3 "lights" in a triangle formation (but they did not appear to be 3 lights fixed to 1 object, you could tell they were separate objects flying thru the air.)

they were moving from south to north, (traveling in a direction opposite of the nne wind conditions that night) there was no sound coming from them. they were moving in a forward motion at a speed close to that of an aircraft. they eventually flew beyond our sight and/or behind the few clouds that were out that night. *one note- there was no wind that night. even the clouds above moved very slow, way slower than these objects were traveling.

after those 3 disappeared from our sight, the young man recording noticed 2 more lights, traveling at the same speed, same direction (going south to north but not in "same" exact location). they  originated in same spot in the sky as the first 3. and again, traveled at the same speed as first 3, traveled across the sky til out of sight and/or behind clouds.

then almost at  the same time those 2 disappeared, 2 more "lights" appeared in same spot in sky, traveled the same speed as the previous ones but these 2 "lights" did travel almost the same direction as the previous 2. again traveled across the sky in forward, "propelled" speed and disappeared out of sight and/or behind cloud cover.

after they disappeared, i went inside bar and mentioned this to the few people in there. i was inside for about 2 mins. when i decided to go back out for a look. looking around i did not see any of those same lights but i did see a steady "red light" in the sout/west horizon. upon seeing this red light "staying in a fixed  spot for about a min. i asked 1 of the people in the bar to come out and take a look. the red light stayed in exact same spot, pretty much "fixed" but the light changed from red to white back to red again. by the time this other person came out, i pointed to the light in the sky, it was now red, and again, not moving & very fixed in the sky. then the  light moved forward at a slow rate, again changing from red to white, back to red. then stopped completely still in the sky. then it moved backward to the direction it came in, at the same rate of speed. then it moved behind a tree & house out of sight.

this last "red/white" light i can almost pretty say may have just been a drone. but those first 7 "lights" i do not think so due to the speed, height and characteristic ways that the "flew".
content.summary: 7 moving lights (1 group of 3, 2 groups of 2)

content.detailedDescription:
This case was filled out and filed at mufon headquarters, with witness on the phone, on wednesday july 5th, by field investigator l. flechtner 18809----------------------------------------------------------------------------


we were walking the dog at pammel park near the winnebago dealership, when my wife saw something in the sky and said "whats that"? it was a silver cylindrical object flying by. it was three times larger and faster than a commercial plane. it seemed to fly lower than commercial aircraft, 25,000 to 30,000 feet. the craft seemed silver and reflected the sun. the craft made no noise, had no wings or windows and left no vapor trail.
about as soon as the first one was out of sight, a second one flew by. the same size, altitude and speed. as soon as the second one was out of sight a third, fourth, fifth and sixth ones went by doing the same thing. 
we watched for 15 to 20 minutes. after the first ones went by, i took some pictures with my phone.
 i will send them to the field investigator filling out this report so they can attach them to my report. you have to zoom in to see the cylinders. 

we live in texas and were having our winnebago serviced at the dealer and they gave us a rental car. we normally live in texas. we will be going on vacation out of the country, until the middle of july.
content.summary: We were walking the dog at pammel park near the winnebago dealer, when my wife saw something in the sky and said whats that. it was a silver cylindrical object flying by. it was three times larger and faster than a commercial plane.

content.detailedDescription:
last night (07/04/2017) at exactly 9:51 p.M., myself and four of my friends witnessed a ufo sighting in the southern sky south of yreka, california, during the fireworks display. 
at first it was thought to be a high-flying jet liner, but then it stopped and didn’t move. it was a neon green object that appeared to be round, but was to far away to discern its exact shape. after watching it for a minute or two, it began to make unnatural maneuvers un-like anything any of us had ever seen before (quick turns, and reversals of direction), then came back to its former spot and was stationary. it made these sorts of maneuvers three times during the fireworks display. 
after the last maneuver, the object changed color, from green, to white and red. it was about the size of the largest visible star, and seemed to be flying in the upper atmosphere at about a 45-degree angle from where we stood. we commented to each other that it was probably watching the fireworks displays in yreka and lake siskiyou (a lake immediately west of mt. shasta).
about 30 seconds after the grand finale (10:10 p.M.) the object turned a bright red. it began moving slowly in a northwestward direction and we lost view of it as it passed behind a tree. emerging from the other side of the tree, the glowing red object began to pick up speed, and made an abrupt turn westward. it then darted from that position (still about a 45-degree angle), and in about two or three seconds disappeared over the mountains on the horizon. this occurred about 10:12 p.M.
it was too fast and too high in the atmosphere to have been a drone. when it sped west over the horizon, it was at super-sonic speed, yet did not have a tail, or light trail behind it like meteors have. 
i contribute this in hopes that others may also have saw it, and captured it on their cell-phone cam. it was so distracting, we payed more attention to it than we did the fireworks show. if it caught our attention that much, others must have surely witnessed it also. i’m anxious to see if it makes the newspapers or local news channels. it was a life changing experience.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo siting over yreka,california during fireworks display at county fairgrounds. (07-04-2017)

content.detailedDescription:
I went onto my balcony on the evening of july 4th to look at the fireworks, this was about 9:30pm.

i saw off to the east approx 1 mile away stationery red and green lights in the sky (i thought it was a helicopter).  then it moved very quickly in a straight line in a southern direction and stopped, then went back to its original position, stayed there for 30 seconds or so, and went back to the  southern position again.  at this moment i tried to video it, but no success due to my lack of skills on my iphone.  after 1 minute or so this object ascended very quickly, stopped and descended down below the treeline.  i'm overlooking a golf course and the object ame down past the golf course where i lost eye contact.  

i have never seen anything in the sky move in this way.  from a stopped position to a fast speed without acceleration.  i was looking towards downtown orlando where a fireworks display was staged at some time in the evening.  too precise and fast to be a helicopter.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red and green lights moving very fast and precise low in the sky over downtown orlando

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the fireworks over wilmington high school on july 2nd 2017. when at approximately 9:50 just as the grand finale began. i noticed a green sphere shaped craft descend from the clouds to my right. maybe about a mile away from us and about 500-1000 feet in the air. it hovered while pulsating from a lime green to a white green. it flew a little towards our direction and then stopped again and hovered. motionless. i have used drones before and this was by far to big to be a drone and hovered way to motionlessly. the odd thing about the incident was the military planes that were seemingly flying right in to the fireworks as they were being shot up in to the air. the fireworks were halted at one point for a couple minutes oddly as well just before the grand finale. during the finale the craft seemed to manouver a few times almost circling in a small area but with great speed and then coming to a dead stop to hover yet again. finally another plane made it's way towards the object in which then the object finally bolted off to the right and out of view after a minute. but before it was out of view i noticed to planes coming from the distance heading in the same direction of the object. i had never seen anything like that before. seemed like it was watching the fireworks and then when spotted by the planes it took off abruptly. was a very cool thing to see as well as interesting since there are no airbases around the town this event took place...I wanted to film it but was too afraid i would miss a second by grabbing my phone from my pocket. i'm hoping someone filmed it or has pictures.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Pulsating green orb watches fireworks and bolts off as planes approach

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9 on 4th of july, i was trying to film the vallejo fireworks from my porch. i was with my sister who said "are those white lights fireworks" i told her no and at first thought it was a plane, but once i noticed there was no jet stream and it was reversing at high speed i grabbed my phone and started recording. by then i believed it was a ufo. it was weird because it would be hovering in place, and then suddenly move slowly, or shoot forward in high speed and then blink and be way further back as if it reversed.  every once in a while it would blink very fast then there would be a quick flash of light and it would be way further ahead. i began talking to my brother about it, who told me to keep recording but my phone died. i continued to watch them when two more blinking lights appeared right next to it out of thin air. and then two more came from the right and left . they split up and hovered in place in far locations for an hour until they flew behind trees hills or houses. i couldn't find them again.
content.summary: I was trying to film fireworks when i saw the light last night, later 3 more lights appeared besides it out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription:
On vacation in chilliwack bc in 2014 my wife took some night sky pictures. she came home and i uploaded them to my computer. i didn't look very close till today. there is something strange in some of the photo's. it appears in some but no other shot's of the same sky area. she was actually looking at the moon and the other object to the right which i assume is cerus. the object to the left of the moon turned out to be interesting. i'll send about 20 pictures and you can see what i'm talking about.
in the pictures the object on the left appeared for several frames then disappeared at picture s0011001. it never appeared in subsequent pictures. she took 1/2 hour or so of pictures of the same area of the sky.
content.summary: Light in sky.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9 on 4th of july, i was trying to film the vallejo fireworks from my porch. i was with my sister who said "are those white lights fireworks" i told her no and at first thought it was a plane, but once i noticed there was no jet stream and it was reversing at high speed i grabbed my phone and started recording. by then i believed it was a ufo. it was weird because it would be hovering in place, and then suddenly move slowly, or shoot forward in high speed and then blink and be way further back as if it reversed.  every once in a while it would blink very fast then there would be a quick flash of light and it would be way further ahead. i began talking to my brother about it, who told me to keep recording but my phone died. i continued to watch them when two more blinking lights appeared right next to it out of thin air. and then two more came from the right and left . they split up and hovered in place in far locations for an hour until they flew behind trees hills or houses. i couldn't find them again.
content.summary: I was trying to film fireworks when i saw the light last night, later 3 more lights appeared besides it out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription:
About 10:15 pm saw a red orb moving real slow thought it was a airplane. myself brother-in law and my wife were porch sitting. bro-in law was facing the orbs he asked what is that a plane?I turned and saw red orb and went to say a plane then realized the orb was bigger solid red moving very  very slow. then we saw another and commented that they were going slow then another appears another slow until total of four moving in a southerly direction until they were blocked by trees then gone out of sight. my brother/in law yelled out they look like a triangle formation.I wasn't able to view anything else the sighting was about 5min in duration.
i asked on facebook if anyone saw the orbs last night and a girl who i donor know responded the she saw orb in westerly direction.
content.summary: First seen red orb slow within a space oft ten min seen three more saw four going slow

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in the eastern part of charles c. winburn  in northglenn  co. across from my condo, watching fireworks, when my girlfriend noticed a red-orange light above a tree to our north, (to our left, above 112th ave) move straight up rapidly. 

i did not see it ascend, but    spotted it    the second  she pointed it out.  i watched   as   it appeared to hover motionless,   for about 10 seconds, before  rapidly descending.  as it descended, i noticed it change colors, from red, orange, yellow then white. it hovered there for a few seconds, then accelerated to the right (east)  rapidly where it momentarily disappeared behind a tree. we saw it again for a brief time as it ascended slightly above the tree that was was blocking our vision. 

we continued searching the sky for it for it  about 5 minutes afterwards,   before spotting  it once more toward the east. (the direction we faced as we sat)
this time it was higher in the sky and was descending rapidly. again i  noticed it   changing colors as it dropped, until it just flickered out and disappeared. we never saw it again.
now i know considering the day of the year, people might want to dismiss our sighting as a mis-identification of fireworks, but we were watching fireworks go off in all directions, and this light didn't act or look like any firework that i have ever seen before.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light moved quickly straight up then hovered, moved down, changed direction suddenly then disappeared

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We were driving home at approx.2200 hrs when i saw what i thought was a new, very high radio tower. i then realized it was not that but an inverted l shape showing three lights, one on each corner. it ascended from the height i first observed it to a very high altitude. no sound. no flashing of the orange/yellow lights.I did not see any form of an aircraft or solid shape that would indicate what it was.  movement west/southwest on rt 328 towards millerton pa.. it moved very fast and was soon out of sight. tried to get video of it but my old i4 did not record over 5 seconds of it. bright clear night. no cloud cover. bright moon. have never witnessed anything like this before. i have operated msq 28 radar and rhi radars in military and have experience as forward observer, identifying aircraft during the 1960's for us army. non drinker or drug user. passenger in vehicle observed same thing i did.
content.summary: Thought it was new radio tower. saw three lights like an inverted letter l..Equal-distance .No sound. no change in shape.

content.detailedDescription:
At around 9:30 pm i was heading outside to watch fireworks, and noticed a strange glowing red/orange light through the window to the north. i felt excited, and i knew it wasn't a plane or a firework. i went out my front door and outside i saw another one much closer to the south. it flew directly over my head traveling north at maybe 35 - 45 mph? (unsure on the speed) 
over the next hour and a half i saw at least 6 more at different times. they were to the east and the west. all seemed to be travelling north. i didn't notice any sound coming from them, and they were not flashing. i stopped seeing them about the time a thunderstorm arrived shortly after 11pm.
content.summary: Multiple auburn crafts

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were coming home from tavares, fl fireworks. we had the top off the jeep and as we were pulling into driveway i saw a strange glowing light and asked him do you see that light. he said what light i pointed and said that one over power lines. he then saw and said i dont know. we didnt even park jeep yet he stopped immediately left jeep running and we got out to see it. it slowly went over us in a sphere orange glow too big to be a star in sky and we watched it go past us overhead from north east to south west and just disappeared after about a minute. my boyfriend ran inside to grab a flashlight then flashed it in the sky all over. then we saw a white glow moments later in the sky as high as a jet moving slow from south to north and he flashed his led spotlight at it. then we got flashed two quick burts of light back. i freaked out and tried to lay down he stayed outside with his flashlight. then few minutes later i hear him pounding on front living room window yelling for me to hurry outside. i got up and ran back outside to him and he was pointing up to look. i saw another orange glowing orb moving from east to west then curved toward and over the lake. he said it flashed those 2 quick beams of light again. i did not witness the flash of beams this time. i was so scared i came in again and stayed this time. he came back in after 10 minutes.
content.summary: Saw 2 glowing orbs that vanished into thin airand 1 white .Flashed light at us

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to school and as i approached the entrance i noticed a white rectangular object with curved edges and blue-black stripes slowly hovering towards the north west, i noticed it out of the corner of my eye thinking it was a cloud, but seemed to quick and smooth to be a cloud or aircraft, i was intrigued to see what it was but lost sight of it as trees were blocking the line of sight.
content.summary: Saw a white rectangular-like shape with curved edges traveling to slow to be a plane, i cannot explain it
